string.value: Oh no! I lost the #t4031190# that lets me talk to #p2012019#. What should I do? I better go talk to #b#p2012012##k again.

#p2012012# told me since she had already made it once, making #t4031190# again shouldn't be a big problem, and asked me to gather up the materials for it. Since she said this time, it won't even require as many materials, I better go get #b50 #t4000073#s#k, #b10 #t4003004#s#k, and #b10 #t4000021#s#k? 

#i4000073# #t4000073# #b#c4000073#/50#k
#i4003004# #t4003004# #b#c4003004#/10 
#i4000021# #t4000021# #b#c4000021#/10#k#k

I gave #p2012012# all the materials needed, and I wound up getting another #t4031190#. Phew... #p2012012# told me to visit her again if I ever get to lose #t4031190# again, but I better start watching out for myself.
안녕하세요? #p2012019#와 대화는 잘 하셨어요? 네? 어머... #t4031190#를 잃어버리셨다고요? 저런... #p2012019#하고 꼭 대화하고 싶으시다면 #t4031190# 를 다시 만들어 드릴게요. 다만 재료는 당신께서 구해 오셔야 하는데... 괜찮으시겠어요?
한 번 만들어 본 것이니 아까보다 익숙해져서, 재료를 덜 들일 수 있어요. #t4000073# 50개와 #t4003004# 10개, #t4000021# 10개를 가져와 주세요. 그 정도면 #t4031190#를 만들어 드릴 수 있을 것 같아요.
어려우시다면 어쩔 수 없죠... #t4031190#를 못 찾으시겠다면 다시 만들어 드릴 테니, 다시 이 곳으로 오세요.

Hello there? Did you have a good talk with #p2012019#? What? ... you lost #t4031190#? Oh no... If you really want to talk to #p2012019#, then I'll make you another #t4031190#. This time, however, you'll have to get the materials for me. Is that going to be okay with you?

Since I've made this before, I know what to do now, so it won't require as many materials as before. Please bring me #b50 #t4000073#s#k, #b10 #t4003004#s#k, and #b10 #t4000021#s#k. That should be enough to make a #t4031190#.
I understand if it's too difficult for you. If you still can't find #t4031190#, then I'll make it for you again, so let me know when you need a new one.
Did you bring all the items for #t4031190#? Ahh, you did bring them all. This should be enough to make #t4031190#. Hold on for a second...
Okay, here's your new #t4031190#. I had a far easier time making this as opposed to last time. Please don't lose it!
If you wind up losing #t4031190# again, please drop by again. Bring me the items, and I'll make one for you.
Hmmm... I don't think you've brought all the items for #t4031190#, yet. Did you forget the list of items needed to make this? I need #b50 #t4000073#s#k, #b10 #t4003004#s#k, and #b10 #t4000021#s#k.
